rawConfiguration.text:
![nginx-logo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/newrelic/newrelic-quickstarts/main/quickstarts/kubernetes/nginx/logo.png)

### Overview

The NGINX ingress controller exposes many useful metrics that can be scraped by a Prometheus server or agent. These metrics can inform you of ongoing process connections and the current ingress load that your system is handling. Furthermore, these metrics can inform you on ingress config reloads and empower alert conditions on config reload errors or unexpected config changes.



---

### About this Dashboard

This dashboard is based on metrics sent to New Relic using [Prometheus Agent or Prometheus Server.](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/prometheus-integrations/get-started/send-prometheus-metric-data-new-relic/)

For information on the prerequisites for this dashboard, please visit [our documentation here.](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/infrastructure/prometheus-integrations/integrations-list/ingress-controller-integration)

nrqlQueries.query: FROM Metric SELECT if(latest(nginx_ingress_controller_config_last_reload_successful) < 1, 'Errors', 'No Errors') AS 'Last config reload errors' FACET prometheus_server WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND prometheus_server IN ('{{tags.prometheus_server}}')

FROM Metric SELECT latest(nginx_ingress_controller_config_last_reload_successful_timestamp_seconds) * 1000 as 'Last successful config reload' FACET prometheus_server WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND prometheus_server IN ('{{tags.prometheus_server}}')

FROM Metric SELECT sum(nginx_ingress_controller_requests) WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND prometheus_server IN ('{{tags.prometheus_server}}') AND instance IN ('{{tags.instance}}') FACET status

FROM Metric SELECT average(nginx_ingress_controller_nginx_process_connections_total) AS 'Average process connections' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND prometheus_server IN ('{{tags.prometheus_server}}') AND instance IN ('{{tags.instance}}') FACET concat(prometheus_server, ' - ', instance) TIMESERIES

FROM Metric SELECT rate(sum(nginx_ingress_controller_request_size_count), 1 SECONDS) FACET concat(prometheus_server, ' - ', instance, ' : ', status) WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND prometheus_server IN ('{{tags.prometheus_server}}') AND instance IN ('{{tags.instance}}') TIMESERIES

FROM Metric SELECT count(nginx_ingress_controller_requests) WHERE  instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND prometheus_server IN ( '{{tags.prometheus_server}}' ) AND instance IN ( '{{tags.instance}}' ) AND ingress IN ( {{ingress}} ) FACET ({{dimensions}})

widgets.title: Upstream service latency by ingress definition

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT rate(sum(nginx_ingress_controller_ingress_upstream_latency_seconds_sum), 1 SECONDS) FROM Metric WHERE  instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND prometheus_server IN ( '{{tags.prometheus_server}}' ) AND instance IN ( '{{tags.instance}}' ) AND ingress IN ( {{ingress}} )  TIMESERIES 60000 SLIDE BY 10000 facet {{dimensions}}

SELECT bucketPercentile(nginx_ingress_controller_request_size_bucket, 50, 75, 90) As 'Request size' FROM Metric WHERE  instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND prometheus_server IN ( '{{tags.prometheus_server}}' ) AND instance IN ( '{{tags.instance}}' ) AND ingress IN ( {{ingress}} ) TIMESERIES facet {{dimensions}}

SELECT bucketPercentile(nginx_ingress_controller_request_duration_seconds_bucket, 50, 75, 90) As 'Request duration' FROM Metric WHERE  instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND prometheus_server IN ( '{{tags.prometheus_server}}' ) AND instance IN ( '{{tags.instance}}' ) AND ingress IN ( {{ingress}} ) TIMESERIES facet ({{dimensions}})

SELECT bucketPercentile(nginx_ingress_controller_response_size_bucket, 50, 75, 90) As 'Response size' FROM Metric WHERE  instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND prometheus_server IN ( '{{tags.prometheus_server}}' ) AND instance IN ( '{{tags.instance}}' ) AND ingress IN ( {{ingress}} ) TIMESERIES facet {{dimensions}}

SELECT bucketPercentile(nginx_ingress_controller_response_duration_seconds_bucket, 50, 75, 90) As 'Response duration' FROM Metric WHERE  instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND prometheus_server IN ( '{{tags.prometheus_server}}' ) AND instance IN ( '{{tags.instance}}' ) AND ingress IN ( {{ingress}} ) TIMESERIES facet {{dimensions}}

FROM Metric SELECT rate(sum(nginx_ingress_controller_nginx_process_cpu_seconds_total), 1 SECONDS) WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND prometheus_server IN ('{{tags.prometheus_server}}') AND instance IN ('{{tags.instance}}') FACET concat(prometheus_server, ' - ', controller_pod) TIMESERIES

FROM Metric SELECT rate(sum(nginx_ingress_controller_nginx_process_resident_memory_bytes), 1 SECONDS) WHERE instrumentation.name = 'remote-write' AND prometheus_server IN ('{{tags.prometheus_server}}') AND instance IN ('{{tags.instance}}') FACET concat(prometheus_server, ' - ', controller_pod) TIMESERIES
